statements.update: update DAFTUNIT set REV_BY=#Rev_by# and REV_DATE=#Rev_date#
update DAFTUNIT set REV_BY='' and REV_DATE=null
statements.select: select D.ID, D.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, D.AKROUNIT, D.ALAMAT, D.TELEPON, D.KDLEVEL, rtrim(D.TYPE) as TYPE , ltrim(rtrim(D.KDUNIT))+' - '+ltrim(rtrim(D.NMUNIT)) KDNMUNIT from DAFTUNIT D

IF (#Unitkey# in(SELECT UNITKEY FROM DAFTUNIT WHERE KDLEVEL IN('4','5'))) BEGIN select D.ID, D.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, D.AKROUNIT, D.ALAMAT, D.TELEPON, CAST((CAST(D.KDLEVEL AS INT) - 3) AS CHAR(1)) as KDLEVEL, rtrim(D.TYPE) as TYPE , ltrim(rtrim(D.KDUNIT))+' - '+ltrim(rtrim(D.NMUNIT)) KDNMUNIT from DAFTUNIT D where 1=1 AND LEFT(D.KDUNIT,18) IN(SELECT LEFT(KDUNIT,18) FROM DAFTUNIT WHERE UNITKEY=#Unitkey# AND D.KDLEVEL=KDLEVEL) AND KDLEVEL IN('4','5') order by D.KDUNIT END ELSE BEGIN select D.ID, D.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, D.AKROUNIT, D.ALAMAT, D.TELEPON, CAST((CAST(D.KDLEVEL AS INT) - 3) AS CHAR(1)) as KDLEVEL, rtrim(D.TYPE) as TYPE , ltrim(rtrim(D.KDUNIT))+' - '+ltrim(rtrim(D.NMUNIT)) KDNMUNIT from DAFTUNIT D where 1=1 AND LEFT(D.KDUNIT,18) IN(SELECT RTRIM(KDUNIT) FROM DAFTUNIT WHERE UNITKEY=#Unitkey#) AND KDLEVEL IN('4','5') order by D.KDUNIT END

select D.ID, D.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, D.AKROUNIT, D.ALAMAT, D.TELEPON, (CASE WHEN D.KDLEVEL>3 THEN CAST((CAST(D.KDLEVEL AS INT) - 3) AS CHAR(1)) ELSE '1' END) as KDLEVEL, (CASE WHEN D.KDLEVEL=3 THEN 'D' ELSE rtrim(D.TYPE) END) as TYPE , ltrim(rtrim(D.KDUNIT))+' - '+ltrim(rtrim(D.NMUNIT)) KDNMUNIT from DAFTUNIT D where 1=1 AND LEFT(D.KDUNIT,18) = (SELECT LEFT(RTRIM(KDUNIT),18) FROM DAFTUNIT WHERE UNITKEY=#Unitkey#) AND D.UNITKEY != #Unitkey# order by D.KDUNIT

select D.ID, D.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT,D.UNITKEY as UNITKEY2, D.AKROUNIT, D.ALAMAT, D.TELEPON, D.KDLEVEL, rtrim(D.TYPE) as TYPE , ltrim(rtrim(D.KDUNIT))+' - '+ltrim(rtrim(D.NMUNIT)) KDNMUNIT from DAFTUNIT D

select D.ID, D.UNITKEY,D.UNITKEY AS UNITKEY2, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, D.KDUNIT as KDUNIT2, D.NMUNIT as NMUNIT2, D.AKROUNIT, D.ALAMAT, D.TELEPON, D.KDLEVEL, rtrim(D.TYPE) as TYPE , ltrim(rtrim(D.KDUNIT))+' - '+ltrim(rtrim(D.NMUNIT)) KDNMUNIT from DAFTUNIT D WHERE UNITKEY IN(SELECT UNITKEY FROM DAFTUNIT WHERE RTRIM(KDUNIT)=LEFT(#Kdunit2#,18))
where 1=1 and D.KDLEVEL='2' order by D.UNITKEY
where 1=1 and D.KDLEVEL >= '3' order by D.KDUNIT

where 1=1 and D.KDLEVEL >= '3'
and D.KDUNIT like #Kdunit# + '%' order by D.KDUNIT
where 1=1 and (isnull(D.UNITKEY,'')=isnull(#Unitkey#,'') or isnull(#Unitkey#,'')='' or (D.UNITKEY is null and #Unitkey# is not null))
where 1=1 and D.KDLEVEL in('3','4') and (D.UNITKEY not in (select UNITKEY from WEBUSERSKPD where USERID=#Userid#))
select rtrim(KDGROUP) as KDGROUP from SMARTSYS.dbo.SS20GROUPUSER WHERE USERID=#Userid#
select min(KDLEVEL) as KDLEVELMIN from DAFTUNIT
